alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 7:00PM CST until January 30 at 2:01PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River at Edinburg. * WHEN...From Sunday morning to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Minor overbank flooding is occurring south of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday morning to a crest of 20.5 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Pearl River Edinburg 20.0 16.3 Fri 5 pm CST 18.6 20.5 20.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 700 AM CST.
